quality_assessment: Excellent documentation with comprehensive coverage of all three context providers. Documentation accurately reflects the codebase implementation. Previous drift issues have been resolved.
positive_aspects: Comprehensive documentation of all three context providers (critical_path, dependency, git_history)
Accurate ContextProvider trait definition matches src/risk/context/mod.rs implementation
Provider weights documented correctly (critical_path=1.5, dependency=1.2, git_history=1.0)
Entry point detection patterns documented accurately match implementation functions (is_main_function, is_cli_command, is_api_endpoint, is_web_handler, is_event_handler, is_test_entry)
Entry point weights (Main=10.0, ApiEndpoint=8.0, CliCommand=7.0, WebHandler=7.0, EventHandler=5.0, TestEntry=2.0) match calculate_path_weight implementation
Contribution formula for critical path matches calculate_contribution function (base_contribution * 2.0 for user-facing)
Blast radius contribution thresholds match classify_contribution_by_blast_radius implementation (>10=1.5, >5=1.0, >2=0.5, 2=0.2, <=1=0.0)
Risk propagation convergence parameters (MAX_ITERATIONS=10, CONVERGENCE_THRESHOLD=0.01) documented correctly
Git history bug fix detection with word boundary matching and exclusion filters documented accurately
Stability status classifications (HighlyUnstable, FrequentlyChanged, BugProne, MatureStable, RelativelyStable) match determine_stability_status implementation
Context cap of 2.0 to prevent excessive score amplification documented correctly (line 222 of mod.rs)
Clear CLI examples for enabling/disabling providers
JSON output structure for ContextDetails enum variants documented correctly
Good practical examples showing before/after context provider effects
Appropriate warnings about provider-specific TOML configuration being planned but not yet implemented
Research background on bug magnet hypothesis provides theoretical grounding
Performance considerations section with accurate overhead estimates
Valid internal links to related documentation - all 6 links verified working
Previous broken links to 'analysis-guide.md' have been corrected to 'analysis-guide/index.md'
